newsitem.title: USA: Citrix in licensing talks with Microsoft.
newsitem.headline: Citrix in licensing talks with Microsoft.

text.p: Citrix Systems Inc said on Wednesday that it is negotiating a cross-licensing agreement with Microsoft Corp over Microsoft's Windows NT software and certain Citrix technologies.
Microsoft informed Citrix that it may develop some technology itself or license it from another company, if a licensing deal is not reached, Citrix said.
Citrix said it believes that not reaching a deal would "have a material adverse effect on the company's business, results of operations and financial condition."
